briefTitle: Special Investigation For Patients With Renal And/Or Hepatic Disorders On Aromasin
officialTitle: Special Investigation For Patients With Renal And/Or Hepatic Disorders On Aromasin (Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participants With Factors Considered to Affect the Safety and/or Efficacy of Exemestane
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Subjects with postmenopausal breast cancer (including ovariectomy etc.).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients cannot be evaluated.For example, not administered Exemestane (Aromasin).
